## Source: ossf-package-analysis (253e4743d8b8183de69bf226274c4bfcabf8516dc9b77f5e2a9772ad6a2e4747)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@ms-atlas-module/datastudio-datafactory' @ 0.1.36 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
